name: Buttery Spread - GMTK Jam 2020
description:
Buttery Spread is a 3D timed-based, casual game with the goal to butter toast.  Take aim and launch your out of control slippery stick of butter onto the kitchen table and spread that butter.

Take aim!

SPREAD THAT BUTTER!!!

Enjoy the ALL ORIGINAL art and sounds of BUTTER and more!!!
